mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account (username, password, mail, mail_send_time, auth_key) VALUES (#{username},#{password}, #{mail}, #{mailSendTime}, #{authKey})
insert into account (auth_key) values (#{authKey}) where username = #{username}
mapper.update: update account set isEmail_verified = 1 where username = #{username}
mapper.select: select auth_key from account where username = #{username}
select password from account where username = #{username}
select exists ( select * from account where ${column} = #{value} ) as success
